columns.name: SMILES
columns.dc:description: Simplified Molecular Input Line Entry System string

columns.name: source
columns.dc:description: Source of the data point (e.g., ECOTOX, PPDB)

columns.name: year
columns.dc:description: Year of the study or record

columns.name: toxicity_type
columns.dc:description: Type of toxicity assay (e.g., Contact, Oral)

columns.name: herbicide
columns.dc:description: Flag indicating if the chemical is a herbicide (1=yes, 0=no)

columns.name: fungicide
columns.dc:description: Flag indicating if the chemical is a fungicide (1=yes, 0=no)

columns.name: insecticide
columns.dc:description: Flag indicating if the chemical is an insecticide (1=yes, 0=no)

columns.name: other_agrochemical
columns.dc:description: Flag indicating if the chemical is another type of agrochemical (1=yes, 0=no)

columns.name: ppdb_level
columns.dc:description: Pesticide Properties DataBase level or classification
